name: GentleWaves
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gentle waves
Developer Terms of Use
des: Gentle Waves is an Alexa skill designed to help you unwind and de-stress whenever you need it. With a wide range of calming sounds, including nature sounds, white noise, and ambient music, you can find the perfect soundscape to suit your mood. Whether you're trying to meditate, focus, or simply escape from the distractions of daily life.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
